verbose_text: Therefore, our results that the serum IFN-gamma levels were higher in the ADA positive than in the ADA negative group after IFX treatment, and that there was no correlation between the levels of IFN-gamma and DAS28-ESR, might indicate type I IFN driven helper T-cell skewing in ADA positive patients.
evidence: IFN-driven helper T-cell skewing in ADA
